subject: Umpires
Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: RENO, Nev., June 8 (AP) — The Golden Baseball League settled on a punishment Friday for a public address announcer who was ejected from a minor league game for inciting criticism of an umpire: It made him spend an inning in the ump’s shoes.
snippet: RENO, Nev., June 8 (AP) — The Golden Baseball League settled on a punishment Friday for a public address announcer who was ejected from a minor league game for inciting criticism of an umpire: It made him spend an inning in the ump’s shoes.
